text: A Ghost Story is a 2017 American supernatural drama movie written and directed by David Lowery. It stars Casey Affleck, Rooney Mara, Will Oldham, Sonia Acevedo, Rob Zabrecky, and Liz Franke. Affleck plays a man who becomes a ghost and remains in the house he shares with his wife (Mara). ==Release== The movie had its world premiere at the Sundance Film Festival on January 22, 2017. It was released by A24 on July 7, 2017. ==References== Category:2017 drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:American drama movies
